translations: 使动摇；使不安定；使心神不宁

sentences.sentence: Changing schools might unsettle the kids.
sentences.translation: 转学会让孩子心情不能安稳。

sentences.sentence: There is a triffid-like menace that may unsettle delicate spirits.
sentences.translation: 如同巨型植物的造型的威胁意味也许会使一些纤细的心灵动摇不安。

sentences.sentence: Shake your head as you will, Nelly, you have helped to unsettle me!
sentences.translation: 你要摇头尽管摇，耐莉，你帮助他使我不得安宁！
